I L O S E V A 1 @ B A B S O N . E D U
E D U C A T I O N
Babson College - Bachelor of Science in Business Administration Babson Park, MA. May 2014
Relevant Coursework: Options & Futures, Fixed Income and Structured Products, Financial Markets and Instruments, Security Valuation,
Investments, Applied Quant Modeling, Foundation of Management and Entrepreneurship, PROB& STATS Foundation, Economics
Personal Profile:
Effective team member, motivated to gain maximum profit for the company, competition-oriented, able to complete
the assignments with minimal supervision, carry multi-cultural experience, hard-worker, quick learner motivated to improve
R E L E V A N T E X P E R I E N C E

text.b: Basin Holdings US LLC; Accounting Intern Houston, TX. Summer 2013

page.text: Assisted with general ledger entries
Analyzed accounts receivable and accounts payable entries
Prepared financial statements and performed variance analysis
Audited requests, analyzed and reported payrolls; prepared tax returns

text.b: European Parliament (EP); Intern Brussels, Belgium. Summer 2012

page.text: Prepared economical references which were implemented in economical assemblies and committee meetings
Studied strategies of economical development in European countries and prepared presentations for the EP meetings
Along with the team of the deputy of Latvia prepared daily analytical reports; attended parliamentary meetings

text.b: Regional Investment Bank (Regionala Investiciju Banka); Trading Floor Finance Intern Riga, Latvia. Summer 2011

page.text: Prepared Cash Flow and Budget Analysis for the Operational and Trading Department of the bank
Performed daily FX Forwards, FX Spot and FX Swap for clients
Performed monetary trading operations for clients
Analyzed and reported news to the head of the trading floor

text.b: BIBO Company, Co-founder of the company in Babson College; Finance Team Member Babson Park, MA. Spring 2011

page.text: Managed and audited balance sheet, income statement, cash flow and budget analysis
Received the highest grade for the successful company management
Made profit and donated it to the Boston Food Bank

text.b: LATO (Non Government Organization to support and promote NATO); Member and Intern Riga, Latvia. January2010

page.text: Organized events dedicated to promoting NATO to young generations in Latvia, Georgia, and Ukraine
Participated in organizing the NATO Riga Conference 2010 dedicated to foreign and security policy issues in NATO
ACTIVITIES AND INTERESTS

text.b: 85 Broads Club (Network of high-achieving women around the world); Co-founder & President of the club at Babson College

page.text: Created an opportunity for Babson College female students to participate in the prestigious, world-wide professional women’s
organization committed to the economic empowerment of women globally
Motivated and attracted more then 90 passionate smart women on campus to join the club
Held regular monthly meetings; researched and organized off-campus events attendance; organized social gatherings with
students from other colleges like Harvard University, Boston College and Yale University; made connections with such
organizations as The Boston Club and The Center For Women’s Leadership.
Babson College Women’s tennis team - Top 3 player both in doubles and singles; big sports enthusiast; participant of numerous sports
marathons
Goi Peace Foundation and UNESCO; Active member - Received a certificate with acknowledgement for multiple participations in the
International Essay Contests for Young People
The English Speaking Union-Latvia 2009 National Public Speaking Competition – Semi-finalist
A D D I T I O N A L S K I L LS
Computer: Microsoft Office Accounting, Bloomberg, QuickBooks, Reuters, @Risk, Solver.
